item.title: Making walking disabled in a certain area[Still need help]
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

Mr. Despair:

You COULD put rather small objects blocking the players from moving on one side of the room, or do you want me to explain the complex way :?

Well the wall blocks the way, thats not the problem. The problem is when they first teleport there, there is 5 second loading period with the objects that they can walk away before the objects load. And then they can follow somebody and get taken away from behind the wall

item.title: Making walking disabled in a certain area[Still need help]
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:2, topic:342896”]ok so whats the variable called for when you go to that watching place
you add this to it

if(--YOUR VARIABLE FOR WHEN THEY ARE IN THE WATCHING PLACE--() && action == 1){ toX = your x coord of the watching area; toY = your y coord of the watching are; }
well i think thats how you do it.[/quote]
Hmm… Explain what && action == 1) does? I’m not sure this would work

item.title: Making walking disabled in a certain area[Still need help]
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

Greetings Moparscapers. Before I begin, if you don’t know what you’re doing, gtfo.

Now that I have people who KNOW what they’re doing, I am trying to disable waking, and following in a certain area. Nick Is Here and I have created a unique court system(which I released)and I am trying to make it where the “Watchers” of the trial(people who are not participating in the actual trial) are not able to walk, and follow.


	public boolean isInJail() {
		if ((absX >= 2928 && absX <= 2943 && absY >= 3275 && absY <= 3291))
			return true;
		else
			return false;
	}

	public boolean isInJail2() {
		if ((absX >= 2926 && absX <= 2938 && absY >= 3274 && absY <= 3292))
			return true;
		else
			return false;
	}

This is for jail, Nick Is Here thought it may have something to do with this, buuut… I’m not quite sure. Anyway, here is the area where the “Watchers” are.

In case you didn’t know, the red area is where they go.
I would like to know how I disable walking and following

Read full topic
item.source: Making walking disabled in a certain area[Still need help]
